A conductor of a choir is found mysteriously murdered, with burst eardrums. Lionel Kasdan and Frank Salek, an official of Interpol, embark together on a hunt for the killer, and also a secret organization specializing in kidnapping children, in parallel to the official investigation. As research progresses the two men will dive into a case that has its roots in the darkest hours of the Second World War.
